00011 void GUIButton::draw() {
00012 
00013     glPushMatrix();
00014         glTranslated(x,y,0);
00015         glColor3d(color.x, color.y, color.z);
00016         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00017             glVertex2f(0,0); //Top left
00018             glVertex2f(0,height); // Bottom left
00019             glVertex2f(width,height); // Bottom right
00020             glVertex2f(width,0); //Top right
00021         glEnd();
00022     glPopMatrix();
00023 }

00025 bool GUIButton::key(SDL_Event event) {
00026     return true;
00027 }
00028 
00029 bool GUIButton::mouse(SDL_Event event) {
00030     int clickX = event.motion.x;
00031     int clickY = event.motion.y;
00032 
00033     //in the range of the button?
00034     if ((clickX > x && clickX < (x + width)) && (clickY > y && clickY < (y + height))) {
00035         if(event.type == SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN && SDL_BUTTON(SDL_GetMouseState(NULL,NULL)) == SDL_BUTTON_LEFT) {
00036             //Do the callback
00037             callback();
00038         }
00039     }
00040 
00041     return true;
00042 }
00043 
00044 GUIButton::GUIButton() {
00045     x = 0;
00046     y = 0;
00047     width = 1;
00048     height = 1;
00049 }
00050 
00051 GUIButton::GUIButton(int setX, int setY, int setWidth, int setHeight, Point3 setTextColor, Point3 setColor, std::string setText, bool (*setCallback)()) {
00052     x = setX;
00053     y = setY;
00054     width = setWidth;
00055     height = setHeight;
00056     color = setColor;
00057     textColor = setTextColor;
00058     text = setText;
00059     callback = setCallback;
00060 }
